title: Dinnerbone&Searge: 请勿使用15w33a
author: obby825
txt_content:
Searge: I was so busy with working on more important stuff that I couldn't put a hidden feature into this weeks snapshot. No need to look for one.
Searge: 我正忙于一些更重要的工作，这使得我不能在本周的快照中加入隐藏的特性了。你不用找了。


Dinnerbone: There will be a 'b' snapshot very shortly, two big bugs that everybody is running into!
Dinnerbone: 很快会有一个“b”快照，将会修复两个大BUG，每个人都会发现。


Searge: The 'a' snapshot will eat your world for breakfast, please don't use it with any world you care about. A 'b' snapshot will be out soon.
Searge: “a”快照会把你的世界当早餐吃掉，请勿使用它打开任何你的重要的世界。“b”快照很快会放出。


Dinnerbone: Minecraft snapshot 15w33b has been released to fix some very big bugs. Let us never talk about 15w33a again.
Dinnerbone: Minecraft快照15w33b发布了，它修复了几个特别大的BUG。让我们别再提15w33a了。


Searge: We fed the game proper food so it stops eating your worlds now. At least if you ignore the 'a' snapshot and use 'b' 
Searge: 现在我们给了游戏合适的食物来阻止它吃掉你的世界。如果你忽略了“a”快照并使用了“b”的话。

注：启动器中15w33a已除名。

replies.author: Neubulaeko
replies.txt_content:
15w33a娘是一个大吃货，其食量远远超越赤城甚至到达了吞食天地的地步，因此Mojang娘（她的麻麻）没法爱的供养，挥泪将其除出Minecraft家族
真相是将其进行惨无人道的魔改，强迫其变成了15w33b娘，但是由于这次事故15w33b娘san值大不如前，默哀
